p: Docking in the catalytic site showed that all candidates ( Table 3, Figure 4, Figures S1–S3 in the Supplementary Materials) interact with Cys 145 and His 41, which are essential for the catalytic activity of M pro [ 11]. Types of intermolecular interactions that candidates form with amino acid residues are hydrogen bonds, aromatic π–π, alkyl–π, S–π and cation–π interactions.
